meanings.definition: The actions or practices of a tycoon.
meanings.sent1: The tycoonery of the business magnate included making strategic investments.
meanings.sent2: Her successful tycoonery in the tech industry made her a prominent figure.
meanings.sent3: The tycoonery of the billionaire was so impressive that even his competitors admired him.
meanings.sent4: His tycoonery was like a well-choreographed dance, each move calculated and precise.
meanings.sent5: The tycoonery of the real estate mogul was legendary, with each deal more lucrative than the last.

meanings.definition: The status or position of a tycoon.
meanings.sent1: Achieving tycoonery in the business world requires dedication and hard work.
meanings.sent2: His rise to tycoonery was a testament to his entrepreneurial skills.
meanings.sent3: The young entrepreneur dreamed of reaching tycoonery one day and owning a vast empire.
meanings.sent4: In the world of finance, tycoonery is the pinnacle of success and influence.
meanings.sent5: The tycoonery of the industry leader was unmatched, with power and wealth at his fingertips.

meanings.definition: The characteristics or traits associated with a tycoon.
meanings.sent1: His tycoonery was evident in his confident demeanor and sharp business acumen.
meanings.sent2: The aura of tycoonery surrounded him wherever he went, commanding respect and admiration.
meanings.sent3: The young entrepreneur tried to emulate the tycoonery of his role model, studying every move he made.
meanings.sent4: She possessed the natural charisma and leadership skills required for tycoonery in the corporate world.
meanings.sent5: The tycoonery of the industry titan was a blend of intelligence, ambition, and relentless drive.
